article.name: Login Page and Navigation Menu Overview
article.title: Login Page and Navigation Menu Overview
article.body:
This article shows how to access your KnowBe4 products using the login page and navigate between them using the navigation menu.

Login Page

This section will show you how to log in to KSAT, PhishER, Defend, and Prevent.

Login URLs

Select any of the links below to navigate to your desired login page.

United States:

  • KSAT - https://training.knowbe4.com
  • PhishER - https://phisher.knowbe4.com
  • Defend and Prevent - https://admin.egress.com

Canada:

  • KSAT - https://ca.knowbe4.com
  • PhishER - https://ca.phisher.knowbe4.com
  • Defend and Prevent - https://admin.egress.com 

European Union:

  • KSAT - https://eu.knowbe4.com
  • PhishER - https://eu.phisher.knowbe4.com
  • Defend and Prevent - https://admin.egress.com

Germany:

  • KSAT - https://de.knowbe4.com
  • PhishER - https://de.phisher.knowbe4.com
  • Defend and Prevent - https://admin.egress.com

United Kingdom:

  • KSAT - https://uk.knowbe4.com
  • PhishER - https://uk.phisher.knowbe4.com
  • Defend and Prevent - https://admin.egress.com 

Accessing KnowBe4

To log in to your KnowBe4 account, follow the steps below:

  1. Navigate to your KnowBe4 product login URL.
  2. Enter your email address and select Continue.
  3. Enter your email address and password.
  4. Select Login.

Login Page Features

The KnowBe4 login page includes the following elements:

  • Sign-in fields: Enter your credentials to access your account
  • Product demos: Access links to schedule demonstrations for additional KnowBe4 products
Note:Your login credentials remain the same as before the interface update. All training progress, certificates, and course materials are preserved during this transition.

Old Login Page vs. New Login Page

The images below show the old login pages.

 

 

The images below show the new login pages.

 

 

Note:If you are navigating from Defend or Prevent to KSAT or PhishER, you will need to select your region in the region selector drop-down menu on the login page.

New Learner Experience Login Page:

The images below show the new login pages that users will see when they log in to their Learner Experience.

Navigation Menu

The navigation menu provides centralized access to all KnowBe4 applications associated with your account from a single location.

Note:When you navigate to another product using the navigation menu, you may need to log in again for that product. If you are navigating from Defend or Prevent to KSAT or PhishER, you will need to select your region in the region selector drop-down menu on the login page.

Using the Navigation Menu

To switch between KnowBe4 products, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to any KnowBe4 application.
  2. Locate the navigation menu in the top-left corner of your console.
  3. Select the product you want to access from the menu.
  4. You will be directed to the selected application.

The GIF below shows how to use the navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your KSAT console.

 

The GIF below shows how to use the navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your PhishER console.

 

The GIF below shows how to use the navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your Defend console.

 

The GIF below shows how to use the navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your Prevent console.

 

Updated KnowBe4 Logo

The images below show our old and new KnowBe4 logos.

Old logo:

 

New logo:

images.alt:
This image depicts the first step of a single-sign-on (SSO) or multi-stage user authentication page for the KnowBe4 platform.

**Overall Context and Branding:**
*   **Header:** Features the KnowBe4 logo (orange and black text) and the tagline "Human error. Conquered."
*   **Footer:** Displays the copyright notice: "© 2025 KnowBe4, Inc. All rights reserved."

**Primary UI Elements (Login Card):**
The central content is contained within a white card against a light gray background, indicating the authentication workflow.

1.  **Title:** "Log in to your account" (Centered, black text).
2.  **Input Field:** A dedicated text input box designed for initial identity verification.
    *   **Placeholder Text:** "Enter your work email"
3.  **Primary Action Button:** A solid blue button located next to the email input field.
    *   **Label:** "Next"
4.  **Secondary Action Link:** A light gray button container with a centered hyperlink for recovery.
    *   **Label:** "Forgot your password?" (Displayed in light blue text).

The screen prompts the user for their email address before proceeding to the password or organizational authentication stage.
images.context: New Login PageThe images below show the old login pages.

images.alt:
This image displays the password entry screen for the KnowBe4 training platform.

**UI Elements and Context:**

*   **Header:** Features the KnowBe4 logo and the tagline: "Human error. Conquered."
*   **Login Module:** A centered white panel containing the authentication fields.
*   **User Identifier Field:** Located above the password input, this field is populated with a blurred user identifier (likely email address or username).
*   **Password Input Field:** An active text field displaying the placeholder text: "Enter your password."
*   **Primary Action Button:** A blue button labeled "Log In."
*   **Recovery Links (Secondary Actions):**
    1.  "Forgot your password?"
    2.  "Didn't receive confirmation instructions?"
*   **Footer:** Contains the copyright notice: "© 2025 KnowBe4, Inc. All rights reserved."

**Function:** The screen requires the user to submit their password after a user identifier has been confirmed or pre-entered to proceed with session authentication.

This image displays the KnowBe4 application sign-in screen.

**Context and Branding:**
*   The top-left corner features the company logo, "knowbe4" (black text with a red 'o').
*   The overall background is white/light gray with subtle geometric and wave patterns.

**UI Elements (Authentication Card):**
A centralized, white card module handles user input.
*   **Header:** The card is titled "Sign In" (bold, centered).
*   **Instruction:** Below the title is the prompt, "Please sign in with your email address below:".
*   **Input Field:** A label reads "Enter your email address" above a single text input box. The input field is populated with redacted/blurred data (suggesting an entered email address).
*   **Call-to-Action (CTA):** A dark-colored, rectangular button labeled "Continue" is positioned below the input field, serving as the primary action control.
images.context: ogin/oldLoginPage2.png' alt=' '> The images below show the new login pages.

images.alt:
This image displays a split-screen web interface featuring an authentication form on the left and a product promotional panel on the right, under the "knowbe4" brand logo.

**Left Panel (Authentication Form):**

*   **Header:** The logo "knowbe4" is displayed in the upper-left corner.
*   **Sign In Card:** A white, centered modal titled "Sign In," with the instruction: "Please sign in with your email address below:".
*   **Input Fields:**
    *   Email address input field (labeled "Email address").
    *   Password input field (labeled "Password").
*   **Action Links:** A "Forgot Password?" hyperlink is located below the input fields.
*   **Primary Action Button:** A grey button labeled "Login."

**Right Panel (Product Promotion):**

*   **Theme:** Dark background with a large red/orange circular accent graphic in the top right.
*   **Title:** "Explore our HRM+ Products."
*   **Product Grid:** Four distinct product cards are arranged in a 2x2 layout, each featuring an icon, a product name, a description summary, and a "Learn More" link:
    1.  **Cloud Email Security:** Description starts: "Uses behavioral AI that continuously learns and adapts..."
    2.  **Security Awareness Training:** Description starts: "Leverages AI-powered training and simulated phishing..."
    3.  **PhishER Plus:** Description starts: "Harnesses human observation to catch sophisticated attacks..."
    4.  **Compliance Plus:** Description starts: "Includes engaging compliance training that delivers continuously updated content..."
*   **Call-to-Action Button:** A button at the bottom of the panel labeled "Get a HRM+ demo" followed by an arrow icon.

The image displays a webpage interface consisting of two main sections: an authentication panel on the left and a product description panel on the right.

**Left Panel (Authentication Form):**

*   **Branding:** The top left corner features the logo "knowbe4".
*   **Sign-In UI:** A central white card contains the login form.
    *   **Header:** "Sign In".
    *   **Instruction:** "Please sign in with your email address below:".
    *   **Language Selector (Highlighted):** In the top right corner of the card, a dropdown menu is present, displaying the American flag icon and the text "US" followed by a downward caret. This element is emphasized by a thick red bounding box and a large red arrow pointing directly to it.
    *   **Input Field:** Labeled "Enter your email address," followed by a standard empty input box.
    *   **Action Button:** A solid grey button labeled "Continue".

**Right Panel (Product Information):**

*   **Background:** This panel utilizes a dark, textured background with a decorative, angular red circle element in the top right.
*   **Header:** "Explore our HRM+ Products".
*   **Product Grid:** Four distinct products are described in a 2x2 grid format, each with a unique icon, title, short description, and a "Learn More" link.
    *   **Cloud Email Security:** Features an 'X' icon; description mentions "behavioral AI" and detecting "sophisticated phishing attacks."
    *   **Security Awareness Training:** Features a circular arrow icon; description highlights "AI-powered training," "simulated phishing," and "reducing Phish-prone Percentages to under 5%."
    *   **PhishER Plus:** Features an 'ER' icon; description notes "human observation" and "one-click remediation across mailboxes."
    *   **Compliance Plus:** Features a warning/exclamation icon; description refers to compliance training covering "HIPAA, GDPR, PCI."
*   **Footer Call-to-Action:** A dark rectangular button at the bottom labeled "Get a demo" is visible, including a small arrow icon indicating navigation.
images.context: ect your region in the region selector drop-down menu on the login page.

images.alt:
This image displays a clean, minimalist web interface for user sign-in.

**Header:**
*   The top-left corner features the logo and brand name "knowbe4" in black lowercase text with an orange accent on the 'o'.

**Main Content (Central Sign-in Form):**
*   A white modal/card is centered on the screen against a light gray/white background with subtle geometric and curved patterns.
*   **Title:** "Sign In" (Large, bold text).
*   **Instructional Text:** "Please sign in with your email address below:".
*   **Input Field:** A field labeled "Enter your email address" is provided. The input box contains blurred, sample text indicating a partially completed email address.
*   **Action Button:** A dark blue button labeled "Continue" is positioned below the input field, indicating the next step in the authentication process.

**Context:** The image represents the initial screen of a single-factor or multi-factor authentication flow, requiring the user to identify themselves via email address before proceeding to password entry or other verification steps.
images.context: gin pages that users will see when they log in to their Learner Experience.

images.alt:
The image displays the **KnowBe4 platform login interface**, centered on a light grey, stylized background.

**Branding and Context:**

*   The **KnowBe4 logo** is present in the upper left corner.
*   The primary function of the screen is user authentication.

**UI Elements (Login Module):**

The sign-in form is contained within a centered, white rectangular module:

1.  **Title:** "Sign In"
2.  **Instructional Text:** "Please sign in with your email address below:"
3.  **Input Field 1:** Labeled "Email address," accepting user input.
4.  **Input Field 2:** Labeled "Password," displaying masked characters.
5.  **Hyperlink:** "Forgot Password?" (A navigational link for password recovery).
6.  **Call-to-Action (CTA) Button:** A dark-colored, rectangular button labeled "Login," used to submit credentials.

This image captures the top section of the KnowBe4 console, specifically the **Dashboard** view.

**Header and Navigation:**
*   The application logo, **knowbe4**, is visible in the top left corner.
*   The primary navigation bar contains tabs: **DASHBOARD** (highlighted in blue, indicating the current page), **PHISHING**, **TRAINING**, **USERS**, and partially visible text (ASA...).

**Page Content:**
*   The main page title is **Dashboard**.
*   A content card is displayed with the primary title **Organization's Risk Score**.
*   Within this card, a light blue informational banner is present, displaying the text: "Opt-in to migrate to Risk Score v2 across the console, including the main dashboard, all rep..." (text truncated).

**Data Visualization Component:**
*   Below the banner, a section titled **Risk Score History** is visible.
*   Accompanying descriptive text states: "Displays the Organization's combined Risk Sco..." (text truncated).
*   A graph structure is partially visible, showing a y-axis with labeled metrics: **100** and **75**.
images.context: o use the navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your KSAT console.

images.alt:
A screenshot of a web application interface, specifically the **Dashboard** view.

**Left Navigation Pane (Dark Background):**
*   **Header:** Contains a grid icon (with a pointer hover state) and a logo labeled "ER".
*   **Menu Items (Top to Bottom):**
    *   **Dashboard** (Active, highlighted with a sidebar and dark background). Icon: Bar/Line Chart.
    *   **Rooms**. Icon: Two figures in a structure.
    *   **Inbox**. Icon: Open box/envelope.
    *   **Rules**. Icon: Ruler/Measurement tools.
    *   **Actions**. Icon: Double-sided arrow.

**Main Content Area (Light Background):**
*   **Header:** Title "Dashboard" is prominent. A search bar is present with placeholder text "Search..." and a magnifying glass icon/search button.
*   **Announcement Banner:** A light blue notification box containing the text: "Coming Soon: You may notice some visual improveme[nts]. **Learn more**" (A portion of the text is clipped).
*   **Reported Messages Card:** A statistics card showing:
    *   Header: "REPORTED MESSAGES"
    *   Value: "1" (Large numeric display).
*   **Received Messages Section:** A dedicated section or card titled:
    *   Header: "Received Messages"
    *   Partial Content: The number "1" is visible below the header, suggesting a count or a table row.
images.context: avigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your PhishER console.

images.alt:
This image displays a section of a dark-mode software interface, specifically a security or risk management dashboard titled "knowbe4."

**Header and Navigation Bar:**
*   The top left features the "knowbe4" logo and brand text, alongside a hamburger menu icon (three-by-three dots).
*   A breadcrumb navigation element at the top center shows a back arrow icon followed by the active page title, "Defend Dashboard" (underlined).

**Left Sidebar Navigation:**
The sidebar is dark blue with white text and icons, structured under functional headers:
1.  **Home** (Selected, with a light blue chart icon).
2.  **HUMAN RISK MANAGEMENT** (Section Header).
    *   Dashboard (Home icon).
    *   Risk Scores (Speedometer icon).
3.  **DEFEND** (Section Header).
    *   **Defend Dashboard** (Currently selected/highlighted in light blue, with a Home icon).
    *   Recent Emails (Printer/document icon).
    *   Abuse Mailbox (Envelope icon).
    *   Allow / Deny lists (List icon).

**Main Content Area (Dashboard View):**
The main area displays data cards and charts on a dark background.

*   **Metric Card 1: Dangerous Emails**
    *   Title: Dangerous Emails (with a question mark icon for context/help).
    *   Primary Metric: **8** (Large, red font).
    *   Contextual Data: "1 in 96,072 emails (0.01%)".
    *   Trend Data: "100% $\uparrow$ from previous period".

*   **Metric Card 2: Suspicious Emails (Partial View)**
    *   Title (Partial): Susp...
    *   Primary Metric (Partial): **0** (Large, orange font).
    *   Trend Data (Partial): 100% $\uparrow$

*   **Chart Section (Partial View):**
    *   Title: Dangerous or Suspicious emails received.
    *   A line graph (red line peaking at y-axis value 7) is visible, depicting email volume over time. The y-axis shows numerical labels 5, 6, and 7.
images.context: navigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your Defend console.

images.alt:
This image displays the **KnowBe4 security platform UI**, specifically the **Prevent - Dashboard**. The interface uses a dark mode color scheme.

**Header and Title Bar:**
*   Top left features the KnowBe4 logo and app switcher icon (nine dots).
*   The title bar reads: "KnowBe4 Prevent - Dashboard".

**Left Navigation Pane (Sidebar):**
The sidebar organizes features into collapsible sections, with the "Prevent" section currently expanded and active:

*   **Home** (Icon: House)
*   **Human Risk Management** (Collapsible, denoted by a downward chevron)
*   **Defend** (Collapsible, denoted by a downward chevron)
*   **Prevent** (Expanded, denoted by an upward chevron)
    *   **Prevent Dashboard** (Active, underlined, with a house icon)
    *   **Search Emails** (Icon: Magnifying glass)
*   **Protect** (Collapsible, denoted by a downward chevron)
*   **Settings** (Collapsible, denoted by a downward chevron)

**Main Content Area (Dashboard):**
The main panel focuses on breach prevention metrics.

*   **Widget Title:** "Potential Breaches Prevented" (Includes a question mark icon for help/context).
*   **Metrics:** Two large numerical indicators display the count of prevented breaches:
    *   **Current Period:** 0
    *   **Previous Period:** 0
*   **Section Header:** "Breach Type Summary" (This section is visible but contains no data in the displayed crop).
images.context: avigation menu to access your KnowBe4 products from your Prevent console.

images.alt:
[1] Corporate logo and branding identity for **KnowBe4**. The primary logotype, "KnowBe4," is rendered in a thin, orange, sans-serif font.

[2] The letter 'o' in "Know" is replaced by a circular, 3D-style glyph. This glyph contains a black, counter-clockwise rotation or refresh arrow icon.

[3] Beneath the primary logo, a secondary tagline is displayed in a smaller, light-weight, grey font: **"Human error. Conquered."**
images.context: ed KnowBe4 LogoThe images below show our old and new KnowBe4 logos.Old logo:

images.alt:
The image displays a horizontal corporate wordmark, "knowbe4," set against a white background.

**Text and Typography:**
*   The characters "kn," "wbe," and "4" are rendered in a bold, black sans-serif typeface.
*   The letter 'o' is replaced by a graphical icon that maintains the structural spacing of the letter.

**Graphical Element:**
*   The graphical replacement for the 'o' is a stylized, thick, reddish-orange (or dark orange) circular arrow.
*   The arrow component is open and points in a counter-clockwise direction, suggesting a loop or refresh action.

**Context:** The graphic functions as a unified logo/wordmark representation.
